turns.speaker: CALE
turns.text: No, I'm not it.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Yeah, you are. He touched you. You're "it" until you touch someone else.

turns.speaker: CALE
turns.text: I have five kids at home, I know how it works. I'm just not "it". Okay guys? Two fifty.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: You're it.

turns.speaker: CALE
turns.text: Guys. Give me the two fifty and go away.

turns.speaker: CALE
turns.text: Yeah, we're closed. So go away.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Actually we have something for you.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Oh my god, are you alright?

turns.speaker: CALE
turns.text: Yeah, I think.

turns.speaker: CHING CHONG
turns.text: But I came here to learn about America.

turns.speaker: TURK
turns.text: Baby listen, there's nothing more American than not doing anything and getting away with it.

turns.speaker: CHING CHONG
turns.text: Then I'm in. Just like Jerk-Off.

turns.speaker: CHING CHONG
turns.text: Ting tao kuun jahn leeka leeka powww.

turns.speaker: TURK
turns.text: She's saying... a beautiful swan...

turns.speaker: CHING CHONG
turns.text: Sleeeeew sheek baw...

turns.speaker: TURK
turns.text: ... flying gracefully... over the rice fields.

turns.speaker: CHING CHONG
turns.text: Kan maaaaw Roy Orbison kin nah mah oh che.

turns.speaker: TURK
turns.text: ... to the tune of "Only the Lonely" by Roy Orbison.

turns.speaker: TURK
turns.text: I don't get it. Why'd you make him a pirate?

turns.speaker: CHING CHONG
turns.text: I'll tell you why!

turns.speaker: TURK
turns.text: CHING CHONG, What happened to your beautiful Asian accent?

turns.speaker: CHING CHONG
turns.text: Actually, my name is Cindy, the accent just helps me meet boys.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Well I hope the carpet matches the drapes.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Excuse me.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: In the new library there.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Oh, yeah. I don't think they do. You're new here, right?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Depends how you define 'new'...

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: You're the kid who was home schooled.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Yeah. How'd you know?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I've been assigned to write an article about you for the school paper. It was either a feature on you or the new four-color ink pens at the student store.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Four colors? Neato!

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Yeah, well, I'd much rather write an expose or a hard hitting investigative piece, but nothing really ever happens around here. But, I chose you and that's fine.  I'm Jessica Matthews.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: HARRY Dunne.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Hey guys.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Heddo Jeth-ica.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Do you thill want to do an arwticle on me, Jethica?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Yes, you and the whole Special Needs class.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Tomorrow we go on a fee-eee-eee- wald twrip.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: A field trip? Maybe I'll join you. See you tomorrow.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: HARRY!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: MS. HELLER said not to talk to you.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: That's because Ms. Heller doesn't want you to know this whole thing is a scam.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: A-ha! I had a feeling it was all a fake.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: You did?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Yeah. Look at this polar bear. It hasn't moved in half an hour. And those Eskimos over there...I'm sure at least one of them is a mannequin.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Oh Harry, you're so funny. Now I have something that's kind of delicate...

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Oh, you want to talk about your delicates?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Are you trying to be funny? Or are you actually re--, re...special

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: We're all special. Everyone Lloyd and I chose for the class is special.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: You and Lloyd chose the class!?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Excuse me?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Come over around seven.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: O'clock?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Yeah...

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Gotcha.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Wipe your feet. My parents are totally anal.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Ooh gross.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Would you like something to drink?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Yeah, but I'm buying.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Okay, there's a lot for us to go over, so it may get hard for you.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Hard for me? Hard for me? Hard for me? Hard for me?  You had questions?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: I checked with the school board, she's not an accredited teacher.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: That's okay. Lloyd's really the one teaching the class.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: LLOYD? What about Ms. Heller?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: She says that she's got more important things to do now that the new mall opened.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Sit down, I have something to tell you.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I'm fine.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Well, I'll tell you what I think. I think she and Principal Collins are embezzling money from the school, and I think they've been doing it for years.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: What? Well now I'm in a position where I may just heed your help.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Po, po, position...? Hey, here's thought, have you a bathroom?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Just down the hall.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Very good. Back in a jiff.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: HARRY? Are you okay?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Are you kidding? I couldn't be more okay.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: My mom wants to know if you can stay for dinner.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Are you kidding? I'll be down in a "I-crapped-my-pants."

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Coming.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: What are you wearing?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I, uh... changed for dinner. I get dressed for all my meals. Except breakfast and bath-meal.  Boy, it's hot in here. Mind if I open a window?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Okay, what?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Why didn't you tell us your boyfriend was Principal Collins?

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: What? No! Look.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Hey look, it's our teacher.

turns.speaker: JESSICA
turns.text: Of course, she's in on it too. Don't let her see you. Just go get that chest and show the world what Collins has been doing. I'm staying here.

turns.speaker: JESSICA'S DAD
turns.text: Uh... not a great first impression... Dinner's ready.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Then what are we doing sitting around yapping? Let's eat!

turns.speaker: JESSICA'S DAD
turns.text: The name's Walter.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Well la de da.

turns.speaker: JESSICA'S DAD
turns.text: We've got some margarine too if you'd like to scoop it out of the tub.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: No, I'm fine thanks.

turns.speaker: JESSICA'S DAD
turns.text: Well save room for Mrs. Matthews famous baked brisket.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Famous? I've never heard of it.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Is it true what you said to Captain Rob?

turns.speaker: MRS. DUNNE
turns.text: Yes, Harry. I can't home school you anymore. So maybe it's time to make some new friends, some friends your own age...

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I'm just not ready.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Wow, a treasure map! What's the treasure?

turns.speaker: MRS. DUNNE
turns.text: It could be anything. You're going to discover a whole new world when you get to school.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Wow just like Marco Polo.

turns.speaker: MRS. DUNNE
turns.text: I don't follow.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: You know Mom, like in the pool.

turns.speaker: MRS. DUNNE
turns.text: You're going to be just fine, HARRY.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I know I am, Mom.

turns.speaker: MRS. DUNNE
turns.text: Here's your lunch. And an apple and banana for extra energy.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Maybe the treasure's a chest full of apples and bananas!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Mom, you know that never works.

turns.speaker: MRS. DUNNE
turns.text: Right.

turns.speaker: MRS. DUNNE
turns.text: Oh, Harry, I'm so proud of you making a real friend.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Is it okay if he spends the night?

turns.speaker: MRS. DUNNE
turns.text: LLOYD, did you ask your parents?

turns.speaker: MRS. DUNNE
turns.text: Then a sleep-over is okay by me. Okay boys, eat up.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Oh Lloyd, you gotta taste my Mom's pie!

turns.speaker: MRS. DUNNE
turns.text: So boys, how was your first day?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: You could've saved that for the tooth fairy!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: That's stupid! I happen to know my mom is the tooth fairy.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Your mom is the tooth fairy? That is so cool!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Yeah, she must do all the flying around when I'm asleep.  HARRY Dunne.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: No thanks, not hungry. Harry Dunne. Why does that name not sound familiar?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Probably because we've never met.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: No, that's not it. Anyway -  LLOYD Christmas.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Here I am bragging my Mom is the tooth fairy, and I'm talking to Santa's kid!

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: I haven't seen you around here before.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Home school. Til today.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Home school? What's that?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I go to school where I live.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Me too!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I think it's just over there.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Is that what I think it is?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: No, it's a treasure map.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Cool.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: My mom says the treasure's somewhere in the school.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: I don't know. I'm pretty familiar with the school and I've never seen that "X". But... I do know something.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: You're it.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Yeah, dangerous cult. Don't make eye contact or they might talk to you.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Don't we want them to talk to us?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: No no no no no.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Why not?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Well, besides cooties and other medical reasons, they're not in the cool crowd. Which I am, and you want to be. Know what I mean?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Oh my gosh, I don't think she's even wearing underwear!

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: How nerdy is that? I'm wearing two pairs right now.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Me too!

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: You know Harry, this is my favorite time of day.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Yeah, it's nice. And your friend TURK is totally great.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Yeah, he's aces.  Thanks, Turk!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: God, she's beautiful. My wiener's all tingly.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Shift to your left.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Who's Principal Collins?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: The principal.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Wow.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: You know, you're the first person I've brought here.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Oh, is this your special place?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: No, I just usually eat my lunch on the crapper. Saves time. Out with the old, in with the new.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Can we eat there tomorrow?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Sure, but first we have to find kids special, needy and classy enough to be in Special Needs.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: It'll be like taking candy from a stranger.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: H A R R Y...

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: The second R is silent.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Oh, of course.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: One day they'll find a cure.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: You brave soldier.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: We're part of a special class taught by the lunch lady, er, I mean Ms. Heller. Maybe you'd like to join us, it doesn't require any walking.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: And nobody will make fun of your horrible deformity.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: ...oh also, we even have a slogan. 'S' and 'P' stands for 'Special People', which is the kind of kids we are. 'A' and 'Z' is for 'Aren't Zeros' because that is less then one, and when you put it all together it spells...

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: HARRY, what are you doing? She's a foreign exchange student. She doesn't speak the English.  CHING CHONG ching chingy chingy chong chong.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Wow! It's a half-boy, half-horse. The boys walk up to him, impressed.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Now that's more of what we're looking for.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Maybe we should ask Jessica to join the class.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: JESSICA? Please hold for my reaction.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Got any crazy eights?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Go fish.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Oh, yeah. Well I almost always beat Captain Rob.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Who's Captain Rob?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Just a guy I hang out with.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: I know the type. Lives in the basement, smells like a sponge...

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: No! Captain Rob is seven feet tall, wears an eye patch, got a hook for a hand...

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Sounds like a pirate.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: What? No no. He's got a parrot on his shoulder, buries treasure...

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Yeah, he's a pirate.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I don't think so. This guy drinks rum from a barrel, says "yo ho ho" has a peg leg...

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Peg leg?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Yeah, go-cart accident.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Exactly! A pirate!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: If he heard you talking like that he'd make you walk the plank.  Three, two, one. Now it's your turn, spin.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: A-ha! You landed on Candyland! Now swallow it!

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Whoa. What was that?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Your mom made a move on me.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: She did not.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Who knows? Maybe someday I'll be your new daddy.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: LLOYD, she's my mom.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: I can't help my heart. And when I'm your dad, you'll have to do as I say.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Will not.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Don't use that tone with me, young man.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Shut up!

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: I will stop this car right now.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: You're not my real dad.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: You take that back!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Shut Up! Buttlick!

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Where did you learn that word?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I learned it from listening to you! I hate you!

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Kids.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: That would be me, sir. The wife made stew last night.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Shut up Lloyd. You're not married yet.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Collins is a great man!

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Now you see why he was elected principal?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: HARRY.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: You look familiar. Did I have your brother?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Okay. Anyone else have any questions?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: What's with horse-boy, now he's a bright shiny sun?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Don't look directly at him.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: ...and who was Benjamin Franklin again?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: The pilgrim who used penicillin to kill Godzilla.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I didn't know that.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Welcome to public school, my friend.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Hey, teach, how'd you get so smart?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: When you live in the basement of the school, you breathe in a lot of chalk dust. It writes out all the answers on your brain.  Now how about a slushee?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: A. Slushee. Don't tell me.  Abraham Slushee. Third president of the United States.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: And he invented fire.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Nice jugs.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: They can't be real.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: You're it.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Oh, no. You're not gettin' me again.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: You're it.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Oh! Ho! Okay. You wanna go?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Can he do that?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: HARRY, he can and he did. And now it's on like Donkey Kong.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: These are really cold, huh?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: That's why you have to drink it fast, trust me.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Owww... refreshing.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Ow... What do you want to do, HARRY?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I don't know. Owwww.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Maybe I should go home and grade papers. Owwww.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: My head is suddenly killing me. Maybe it's from all the learning today.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Put some ice on it.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Owww.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: And my mouph is frozen.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: There she goes, now wearing nothing but her underwear.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: What a nerd. I don't know where that girl's ever gonna find a husband.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: LLOYD, where've you been? I've been waiting forever. I'm so embarrassed.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Sorry. Why are you dressed like a Queen!?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: ...cause you said...

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: HARRY, I said don't 'dress like a Queen'!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Oh... that makes much more sense. I had a heck of time getting these drapes from my mom. You don't want to know where I put the cord.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: HARRY! Here he comes.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: According to the map, we're just about at school.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Yeah, but we still haven't found any treasure.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Our own special bus.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: How do you know it's for us?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Duh. The cool kids sit in the back of the bus. Here, every row is in the back. We're all cool!

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Nope. I was right.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Wanna bet?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Uh oh. Captain Rob's always been my partner.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Sucks for you.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Who's your partner?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: I don't know. I haven't decided yet.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Well... Uh...maybe... jeez, how can I say this... you and I could...perhaps ...maybe...uh... partner up?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: You and me? Dream on, desperado.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Oh. Sorry. You're right, field trip partner is a big commitment.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: I'm kidding! Of course I'll be your partner.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: That's a cow, Harry.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Well, I could go for a tall glass of polar bear milk right now.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Sorry about that Harry, first time I've brought a friend up there. You okay?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Yea!

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Who cares? Chicks are for fags.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I think she wants me to come over to put me into the right position to check out her delicates, what ever that means.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Oh yeah, buddy, you're gonna get "some".

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Some what?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: You know... She's gonna be all over you like a barrel of monkeys, with her tight shirt and short skirt... Eeeww, it's so faggy I can't even talk about it.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Come on, Lloyd. You must know someone I can talk to.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Sure I do. On one condition.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: You can't marry my mom.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: It's really not up to you, Harry. But we just want you to feel like you're part of the decision.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Shut up!

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Alright, if you really want to go down this road, well girl's like chocolate.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Oh hey Lloyd, why are you here?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Just wanted to see how your doing.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I kinda screwed things up.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: I'm sure you're overreacting.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I don't think so.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: You're always your harshest critic.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: She wants me to stay for dinner, I don't know what to say to her.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Okay, I saw this in a movie once. Open the dining room window and follow my lead. Say what I say.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Good - thanks Lloyd! I'll meet you downstairs, I gotta find some clothes.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: HARRY, can you hear me?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: You have beautiful eyes.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: You have beautiful eyes.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Hey, where did you come from?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Hey, where did you come from?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Do you want me to pet your head?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: I bet you want your head scratched.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I bet you want your head scratched.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Don't snap at me like that. You're lucky I don't punch you right in the face.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Don't snap at me like that. You're lucky I don't punch you right in the face.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Now what are you staring at, you ugly monkey?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: What are you staring at, you ugly monkey?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Sure, I like a woman with some meat on her bones.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: So, have you given him "some" yet?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: LLOYD, what are you doing? That's JESSICA and... my mom.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: HARRY, this is my fantasy! I suggest you leave - before I imagine something horrible.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: But-

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: HARRY!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: You're right. Hey, thanks for the jet pack. Your fantasies are so much cooler than mine. Bye Mom.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: HARRY! I found the treasure!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Go away, assface.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Did you hear what I said? The treasure! Like on your map!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Yeah, right. Why don't you show it to your "girlfriend"?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: JESSICA and I are through. I couldn't stand being with her knowing you liked her. It wasn't worth our friendship. Oh, and she also has a boyfriend.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Do you hear something, Captain Rob?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Captain Rob came back?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Yeah, he does sound like a rat fink.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Hey, there's no reason to use that kind of language!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Good one, Captain Rob. He does look like a you-know-what.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Oh, telling inside jokes now, are we? That's it. You're out of the cool crowd. Next time Turk's passing out wedgies, you ain't gettin' one.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: HARRY, would you like to share with the rest of us what's so funny?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: You wouldn't get it. Just a private joke between best friends.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: No one knows?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Me, me, me!

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: The answer is George Jefferson.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: By the way, did Captain Rob mention how I beat the crap out of him this afternoon?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: No. What happened?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Nothing. Why, whaddya hear?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: A raft.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: A blimp.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: A turd.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: George Washington!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Who?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Hello, he only invented money!

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Wow, we built a whole float in one afternoon. And now the reward.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: What do you mean? We can't go in there or we'll be "it".

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: If you have to ask, you don't know.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Yeah, that's why I asked.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: You certainly did.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I know I did.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Sorry, no further questions.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: You're it.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Am not.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Are, too.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: It's okay. I want the rush.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: No. Look.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Hey, it's Jessica.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: That must be her boyfriend's car.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: PRINCIPAL COLLINS is her boyfriend!

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Now it makes total sense why she didn't want him to know we were in his office the other night.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: No wonder we both struck out with her. Who can compete with the sexual power of the man who occupies the highest office in the land?

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: He's like the Pope. Like we're gonna snake a girl away from the Pope.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Hey, let's go spy on them.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Cute puppy.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: He must be on his way to pee out a fire.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Hey, look. Ice cream.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: You thinking what I'm thinking?

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: You found my treasure? Why didn't you tell me.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Three words. I did. But you were all mad at me and wouldn't listen.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Well, I'm listening now.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Me, too. This is my favorite part of the tape.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: You know Lloyd, the real treasure is our friendship.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: How true. But I still feel I deserve more than you do of this treasure. I mean, I found it.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: But my mom gave me the map.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: I lugged it all over town!

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I made the polar bear pants.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: But I ate your Mom's pie.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I... found that rock.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: It was a diamond and you swallowed it.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: Enough! Look what this cursed chest is doing to us.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: I don't know who we are anymore.

turns.speaker: LLOYD
turns.text: I have no idea - it's full of files and documents and tapes.

turns.speaker: HARRY
turns.text: Do you know what this means?
